airframe.name: DEMO
airframe.makefile:
ARCHI=arm7
FLASH_MODE = IAP
main.ARCHDIR = $(ARCHI) main.ARCH = arm7tdmi main.TARGET = mb1 main.TARGETDIR = mb1
main.CFLAGS += -DCONFIG=\"conf_motor_bench.h\" main.srcs = main_motor_bench.c
main.CFLAGS += -DPERIODIC_TASK_PERIOD='SYS_TICS_OF_SEC(5e-3)' main.srcs += sys_time.c $(SRC_ARCH)/sys_time_hw.c
main.CFLAGS += -DLED
main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/armVIC.c
main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_UART0 -DUART0_BAUD=B38400 main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/uart_hw.c
main.CFLAGS += -DDOWNLINK -DDOWNLINK_TRANSPORT=PprzTransport -DDOWNLINK_DEVICE=Uart0 main.srcs += downlink.c pprz_transport.c
main.CFLAGS += -DDATALINK=PPRZ -DPPRZ_UART=Uart0
main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/mb_servo.c main.CFLAGS += -DMB_TACHO main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/mb_tacho.c
main.CFLAGS += -DADC -DUSE_ADC_0 -DUSE_ADC_1 main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/adc_hw.c main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/mb_current.c
main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/mb_modes.c
